lead_paragraph: The Detroit Pistons basketball team will move to downtown Detroit starting next season, playing in an arena already under construction for the city's hockey team, officials from both teams said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Detroit's NBA Team to Move to Downtown Arena
headline.main: Detroit's NBA Team to Move to Downtown Arena
